Video quality is not 10 as others mentioned.  Clearly visible artifacts from the beginning.

It's absurd someone gave this a 10 for Video quality. He must have watched it on a phone.

If watching on a TV, the quality of this is about a 2. Noise reduction + Sharpening + noisy source, means horrendous artifacts all the way through. I deleted this and kept an old DVD rip.
